member.name: P:Thermo.Interfaces.FusionAccess_V1.Control.IFusionControl.SyringePumpControl
member.summary: Get access to the syringe pump control interface. This interface allows the user to start and stop the syringe pump, set the volume and desired flow rate, and the ability to listen to connection change event.

member.name: T:Thermo.Interfaces.FusionAccess_V1.Control.Peripherals.ISyringePumpControl
member.summary: Gives access to the syringe pump control.

member.name: M:Thermo.Interfaces.FusionAccess_V1.Control.Peripherals.ISyringePumpControl.Start
member.summary: Starts the pumping if connected. If it was already pumping, it applies any cached parameters and leaves it in a running state.

member.name: M:Thermo.Interfaces.FusionAccess_V1.Control.Peripherals.ISyringePumpControl.Stop
member.summary: Stops the pumping if connected. If it was already stopped, it does nothing.

member.name: M:Thermo.Interfaces.FusionAccess_V1.Control.Peripherals.ISyringePumpControl.Toggle
member.summary: Toggles the Start/Stop of the pump if connected.

member.name: M:Thermo.Interfaces.FusionAccess_V1.Control.Peripherals.ISyringePumpControl.SetVolume(System.Double)
member.summary: This attempts to set the volume. The next call to Start (or Toggle) will attempt to apply this value. If the pump successfully sets the value, the Volume property will be updated accordingly.

member.name: M:Thermo.Interfaces.FusionAccess_V1.Control.Peripherals.ISyringePumpControl.SetFlowRate(System.Double)
member.summary: This attempts to set the flow rate. The next call to Start (or Toggle) will attempt to apply this value. If the pump successfully sets the value, the FlowRate property will be updated accordingly.

member.name: M:Thermo.Interfaces.FusionAccess_V1.Control.Peripherals.ISyringePumpControl.SetDiameter(System.Double)
member.summary: This attempts to set the syringe diameter. The next call to Start (or Toggle) will attempt to apply this value. If the pump successfully sets the value, the Diameter property will be updated accordingly.

member.name: P:Thermo.Interfaces.FusionAccess_V1.Control.Peripherals.ISyringePumpControl.Volume
member.summary: Get the currently set volume of the syringe in µL.

member.name: P:Thermo.Interfaces.FusionAccess_V1.Control.Peripherals.ISyringePumpControl.FlowRate
member.summary: Get the currently set flow rate of the pump in µL/min.

member.name: P:Thermo.Interfaces.FusionAccess_V1.Control.Peripherals.ISyringePumpControl.Diameter
member.summary: Get the currently diameter of the syringe.

member.name: P:Thermo.Interfaces.FusionAccess_V1.Control.Peripherals.ISyringePumpControl.Status
member.summary: Get the current status of the syringe pump.

member.name: E:Thermo.Interfaces.FusionAccess_V1.Control.Peripherals.ISyringePumpControl.StatusChanged
member.summary: Occurs whenever the pumping state changes.

member.name: E:Thermo.Interfaces.FusionAccess_V1.Control.Peripherals.ISyringePumpControl.ParameterValueChanged
member.summary: Occurs whenever a parameter value changes.
